def_cn: （尤指盗取他人计算机系统中保密信息的）黑客
def_en: A computer hacker is someone who tries to break into computer systems, especially in order to get secret information.

def_cn: 黑客（指沉迷于电脑之中，无暇顾及其他的电脑迷）
def_en: A computer hacker is someone who uses a computer a lot, especially so much that they have no time to do anything else.
